meanings.definition: A type of tobacco grown in Louisiana.
meanings.sent1: I tried smoking perique for the first time today.
meanings.sent2: The perique leaves have a unique flavor compared to other types of tobacco.
meanings.sent3: The perique plant in the garden seemed to be waving at me.
meanings.sent4: The perique fields stretched out like a green ocean under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The scent of perique lingered in the air, enticing passersby.

meanings.definition: To ferment tobacco using a special process.
meanings.sent1: Farmers perique the tobacco leaves to enhance their flavor.
meanings.sent2: They carefully perique the tobacco to achieve the perfect balance.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally periqued the tobacco too long, and it turned out bitter.
meanings.sent4: The art of periquing tobacco requires patience and skill.
meanings.sent5: The tobacco master periqued the leaves with precision and expertise.
